title: How Can I Use a microSD Card to Import Contacts from Another Mobile Phone to My Phone?
answer:
Your phone supports contact files in the .vcf format only.
To use a microSD card to import contacts from another mobile phone to your phone, do the following:
1、Save the contacts you want to import to your phone to the microSD card as a .vcf file.

2、Insert the microSD card into your phone, access File Manager, and then find the .vcf file.
3、Select the .vcf file.
      The phone displays a message asking you whether to import the contacts from the .vcf file.
4、Touch OK.
